column1: Uchi////Let's start with the drinks. I took a gamble and ordered a sake cocktail
column2: which is something I've never tried before. The drink was called kara kyuri
column3: and it will forever be in my memory as the most delicious cocktail I've ever had. Made with sake
column6: and thai chili - it offered the most beautiful combination of flavors. Although I love spice
column7: I tend to be a bit sensitive to it
column8: so I expected not to like it much. The flavors were so perfectly balanced
column9: that the chili never gave its full bite. It is complemented perfectly by the yuzu and reigned in by the cucumber. Honestly
column10: it's the entire reason I'm writing this review 3 months later.
